Title: Windows system update system encountered problems
Description: ![]() Hello. After the latest update, when I turn on my laptop, only the loading cursor appears after the logo, and there is no other response. How should I handle this? My laptop model is Dell. I tried automatic repair, but the system prompted that the repair failed. Then I restarted the laptop in safe mode, and this appeared. What should I do?
EnhancedContent: Hello. After the latest update, when I turn on my laptop, only the loading cursor appears after the logo, and there is no other response. How should I handle this? My laptop model is Dell. I tried automatic repair, but the system prompted that the repair failed. Then I restarted the laptop in safe mode, and this appeared. What should I do?
Author: OakleyCruz
